explanation: [0-0] The video begins on a snowy ground with a banana peel on the snow in front of the screen. In the distance, there is a glass building.

[0-4] A foot wearing a pink boot steps on the banana. The person in the pink boots slips and lets out a scream, the camera turns to the sky. She falls face down in the snow, wearing yellow clothes, heavy makeup, and pink hair.

[4-10] Then the person in yellow clothes stands up, and a human-shaped snow pit appears in the snow. The face of a woman is revealed in the snow pit, she is wearing heavy makeup and her eyes are closed. At this point, the camera switches to a man wearing a pink wig and a yellow coat, standing in the snow. He opens his eyes, covers his face with his hands, and lets out a sound of horror.
